description:
Tamako is a bubbly, popular high-school student working for the family business. But things suddenly take a turn for the strange when she meets a talking bird named Dera.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Ano Ko wa Kawaii Mochiya no Musume
C`est l`adorable fille du marchand de mochi
That Girl`s the Daughter of a Mochi Shop Owner
あの娘はかわいいもち屋の娘
